sentences.sContent: Extrapolating from his latest findings, he reckons about 80% of these deaths might be attributed to smoking.
sentences.sCn: 从他最近的发现推断，他估计大约80%的这类死亡可能归因于吸烟。

remMethod.val: extra(外面) + pol(放) + ate → 放出想法 → 外推， 推断， 推知

trans.tranCn: 外推； 推断， 推知
trans.tranOther: to use facts about the present or about one thing or group to make a guess about the future or about other things or groups
